name: Solarmoviez Dark
description:
Solarmovie(z) Dark is a CSS theme for Stylish and Stylus that applies the following changes on https://solarmoviez.ru/ website:
  • ⚫ Shifting aesthetics up to a more pleasing, non-eye-burning dark theme.
  • ⚫ Improvement of other aesthetics and usability issues.
  • ⚫ Removal of social sharing buttons, annoying ads and sponsor content.
Go Dark and never look back, your eyes will thank you! Any suggestions or comments, please feel free to drop a feedback at the bottom of this page.
